## Command Description
### tatcli update -h

```bash
tatcli update

Usage:
  tatcli update [flags]
  tatcli update [command]

Aliases:
  update, up

Available Commands:
  snapshot    Update tatcli to latest snapshot version: tatcli update snapshot

Flags:
  -h, --help=false: help for update

Global Flags: see tatcli -h

```
